attributes.action: make all politicians sit an exam in 'How Government works and working in harmony with the civil service"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Premiership football managers, doctors, nurses, lawyers, bus drivers, plumbers etc. all have to have a qualification or exam to do what they do but anyone can run this country! I think a new exam should exist so then the people of this great country might feel more comfortable that their MP's know what they are doing.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
